title: What is something that you have changed that has made you play significantly better?
body:
What did you change that has made you play better?

{{item:1055}} {{item:1056}} {{item:1054}}

replies.body: i watch a bunch of lcs games. it doesnt translate into better mechanics straight away but at least ive learned more about best builds, whats strong in the meta, matchups and counters, how to understand my enemies more etc. also i fucking ward, come at me
just become a one trick pony, you must be one with the champion. Ayy sound inspiring?
Bro not everyone has inspirational story on how they got big by changing their mindset, only a few ...
It could be something simple like they turned smartcast on

I stopped being a little worthless piece of shit twelvie. 



.



.
kappa
